text:
One problem is how it's not sheltered through and through to any other buildings around the bus stop. It gets the job done of getting you to and out of town, but if it's raining, you're probably stuck here.

Also, the road is extremely small and squeezy, and during peak hours, you may be smelling fuel gas smoke while waiting for your bus.

Plenty of long range buses to all part of Singapore! Easy to get seat. Nice alternate way to MRT if you have the time and enjoy views from the bus rides. Walking distance to Wisma Atria for dinning & shopping.
Very convenient very various buses. Can walk from Orchard MRT station towards exit direction of Orchard Boulevard. Just opposite the MRT exit and Ion Orchard.
